Text:
how do i look at them? They are .cbr and .cbzand when i click on them it says Windows cant open them. 
Please help! I REALLY want to read these!
are these supposed to be just cover art or full comics? because when i opened them they are just the covers of the comics...

@ xboxjunkiepro
you need to install a cbr reader program, my personal favorite is "comic rack". extremely simple.

And thanks for the upload, wonderful as deadpool is moving up my list of Marvel favorites.
